tool_description: Identifies grammatical errors in text using comprehensive rule-based analysis including subject-verb agreement, tense consistency, and syntactic structures.

text.description: The text to check for grammar errors

language.description: Target language for grammar checking (e.g., en-US, en-GB, es, fr)

rule_categories.description: Specific grammar rule categories to check

strictness_level.description: Checking strictness: lenient, standard, or strict

ignore_proper_nouns.description: Whether to ignore grammar checks on proper nouns

error_messages: Unsupported language: Provide a supported language code (en-US, en-GB, es, fr, de, it).
Invalid rule category: Use categories like [syntax, agreement, tense, punctuation, style] or [all].
Invalid strictness level: Use one of [lenient, standard, strict].
Text too long: Input text must be under 10,000 characters for grammar analysis.
usage: Provide text and language, optionally specify rule categories and strictness. Returns detailed grammar violations with suggested corrections.

confidence_scores.description: Confidence scores for each suggested correction (0-1)

total_violations.description: Total number of grammar violations found
